sentence.Network_en: Fabvier was factious ; Bavoux was revolutionary.
sentence.Network_cn: 法布维埃是暴动分子, 巴武是革命党人.

sentence.Network_en: Many of the old puritan colonist retain their factious temperament in the new world.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多清教徒殖民者在新大陆仍保持他们好争论的脾气.

sentence.Network_en: Many of the old puritan colonists retained their factious temperaments in the New World.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多旧清教徒殖民者在新大陆仍保持他们好争论的脾气.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from French factieux or Latin factiosus, from factio (see faction)

means.word_mean: 1. dissenting (especially dissenting with the majority opinion)

auth_sentence.content: Entertaining his factious thoughts as you have presented here is pure nonsense.
